---
title: "Gift Shop"
format: html
date: "2025-12-02"
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(mistlecode)

options(scipen = 999)
```
:::




## Part 1

Fun litle bit of regex. I'm pleased it was that easy.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
'input.txt' |>
  readLines() |>
  stringr::str_split_1(',') |>
  stringr::str_split('-') |>
  purrr::map(\(x) {
    sq <- x[1]:x[2]
    sq[
      sq |>
        as.character() |>
        stringr::str_detect('^(\\d+)(\\1)$')
    ]
  }) |>
  unlist() |>
  sum()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 12850231731
```


:::
:::




## Part 2

Just a little regex modification. Nice and simple.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
'input.txt' |>
  readLines() |>
  stringr::str_split_1(',') |>
  stringr::str_split('-') |>
  purrr::map(\(x) {
    sq <- x[1]:x[2]
    sq[
      sq |>
        as.character() |>
        stringr::str_detect('^(\\d+)(\\1){1,}$')
    ]
  }) |>
  unlist() |>
  sum()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 24774350322
```


:::
:::
